content:
"Ensure that the Zulip server you’re importing into is running the same version of Zulip as the server you’re exporting from."

would a export from 5.1 and import into 5.6 be tolerated?

It's not a general rule that doing that between different minor versions will work -- but in this case I believe it should.

In general, though, we try to make there be no reason to hesitate upgrading. Upgrading the 5.1 instance to 5.6 should be quite quick and painless.
